name: Gravity Tanks
description:
The tank war has begun, the enemies are gathered for an attack. All you can do now, is to use your special ability to defend against waves of enemies, but time is running... TICK TOCK...

Keyboard & mouse controls:

  • Foward and backward: W, S.
  • Rotate: A, D.
  • Aim: Mouse.
  • Shoot: LMB.
  • Change camera: C.

Gamepad controls:

  • Foward and backward: R2, L2.
  • Rotate: Left stick.
  • Aim: Right Stick.
  • Shoot: L1.
  • Change camera: R3.
